_header: Ere the fulfilling of time was come / Satan had all the folk I-nome
Title(s): Ratio quare presens opus incipiat dominicam primam aduentusdomini ; Northern Homily Cycle
_description: Ratio quare presens opus incipiat dominicam primam aduentus domini, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Or þe fulthe of tyme was comenSathanas had þe folk all
                    nomen…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…ffor cristis tocome made endingeOf all oure sorowe & oure
                    mornynge
BodAsh42.Attributed Title:
Cause siue racio quare illud opusculum incipiat ab aduentu domini
                    (f. 2v)

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Eor þe folfullyng of tyme was comeSathanas hedde al þe
                    folk y nome…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor his comyng made endyngOf al vr serwe and vre
                    mornyng
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULDd11.First Lines:
Er þe fulfilling of tyme was comesathanas had al þe folk
                    nome…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…ffor his comyng made endyngof al oure sorwe & oure
                    mournyng
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Ecce ego mitto angelum meum qui preparabit & cetera (f.
                        39v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Ar criste god sune of tyme was comenSathanas alle folk had
                    nume…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…ffor crystes come made endyngOf all oure sorowe & oure
                    murnyng
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
Et hic incipit racio quare presens opusculum incipit. Dominica prima
                        aduentus domini (f. 7v)

BLAdd30358.First Lines:
Tyl þe fulth of þe tyme was commynSathanas had all folk
                    bennomyn…
BLAdd30358.Last Lines:
…ffor crist come made endyngOf all oure sorow & oure
                    mornyng

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Er þe fulth of þe tyme was comenSathanas had all man folk
                    noman…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…ffor crist come and mad endyngOff all oure sorow and
                    murnyng

EDCPCM.First Lines:
[A]R þe fulþe of tim was comenSatenas al folk aued
                    nome…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…For cristes to com mad endingeOf al our soru and our
                    murninge
EDCPCM.Note:
Ends incomplete at bottom of page; followed by fragment of page, no text
                    legible.
EDCPCM.Attributed Title:
Incipit racio quare pruleus opus incipiat dominicam primam aduentus
                        domini (f. 16vb)
EDCPCM.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

Lam260.First Lines:
OR þe faithe of tym was comeSathanas all hys tm had
                    nome…
Lam260.Last Lines:
…ffor cristes to com made endyngOff all our sorow & oure
                    mornyng
